name: StealOrNap
description:
You could say i got completely inspired by Deus Ex this weekend. Everything was falling in place like the , tilemap, the characters,  level design .  Got a decent game this time. Most important thing is what do you think? leemme know!! :) 

Just the usual WASD and  Space controls  Enjoy!!

The dialogue system (just a narrotor) is bit slow... deal with it!! Will improve in future! 

[Edit: There is only one level, will update with more ]
